column1: 作词 : Jeffrey Oh/Eric Holljes/Mike Posner
column2: 作曲 : Jeffrey Oh/Eric Holljes/Mike Posner
column3: If I could write you a song to make you fall in love
column4: 如果我可以写首让你爱上的歌
column5: I would already have you up under my arm
column6: 或许你早已对我投怀送抱
column7: I used up all my tricks
column8: I hope that you like this
column9: 施展浑身解数，希望你喜欢这首歌
column12: you think you're cooler than me
column13: 但是你应该不会，因为你觉得自己比我还酷
column14: You got designer shades just to hide your face
column15: 你打扮新潮只是为了掩盖外表
column16: And you wear 'em around like you're cooler than me
column17: 却表现得以为自己独树一帜
column20: 你从不打招呼，我的名字也记不住
column21: And it's probably 'cause you think you're cooler than me
column22: 大概是因为你觉得自己比我还酷
column28: And you wear 'em around like it ain't shit
column30: But you don't know the way that you look
column31: 但是你不知道你看起来像个啥
column32: When your steps make that much noise
column33: 当你走路弄出的那些噪音
column36: I got you all figured out
column37: 我把你了解得通通透透
column38: You need everyone's eyes just to feel seen
column39: 你不过想成为全场焦点
column40: Behind your make up nobody knows who you even are
column41: 光鲜亮丽的背后你根本无人问津
column42: Who do you think that you are
column44: If I could write you a song to make you fall in love
column45: 如果我可以写首让你爱上的歌
column46: I would already have you up under my arm
column47: 或许你早已对我投怀送抱
column48: I used up all my tricks
column49: I hope that you like this
column50: 施展浑身解数，但愿你喜欢这首歌
column53: you think you're cooler than me
column54: 但是你大概不会，毕竟你觉得自己比我还酷
column55: You got designer shades just to hide your face
column56: 你穿着时髦只是虚有其表
column57: And you wear 'em around like you're cooler than me
column58: 却表现得以为自己别具一格
column61: 你从不打招呼，我的名字也记不住
column62: And it's probably 'cause you think you're cooler than me...
column63: 大概是因为你觉得自己比我还酷
